narratives: Hi there partner, you only have enough money to start a small farm. Why not we head over to the market to get started.
On your top right hand corner, you can see the location you are at. Currently you are at your Wheatfarm.
On the bottom left hand corner of the screen, you can see the assets you hold. Currently you have 10 gold to start your farm.
On the top left corner you can see your current level which is 1.1. This tutorial ends at level 1.3
This is followed by the level goals. For this level the goal will be changing your location to the Market

The first command you will be using is a 'Do' command.
The 'Do' command instructs farmer John to carry out an action.
From the example above, 'Do' is the type of task given and 'gotoMarket' is the action to be carried out by the farmer.
The type of tasks available and the action to be executed can be seen in the middle of the screen.
Enter [Do GoToMarket] to create a task that tells Farmer John to drive to the market.
